value:
$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|So... Now what do we do?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We have no choice but to run.$k$pIf Surtr catches us, we're as good as
dead. We have no way to counter
him.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Pain|OK. So we escape. Then what?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*cough*$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Fjorm! That cough just
keeps getting worse. Here, lean on
me.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We can't give up.$k$pI vowed to defeat Surtr and save
Askr. That's why we came to Nifl.$k$pUntil we accomplish that goal, I will
keep fighting.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse...$k$p$EFace_Smile|You're right. It's time to show him
what the Order can do!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That's the spirit! But...the question
remains. Where should we go?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Well... There's something that's been
troubling me.$k$pSo far, the enemy soldiers have been
trying to keep us boxed in.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|That's what our scouts say.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|There is, however, one group of
soldiers to the east that isn't targeting
us.$k$pI think they're pursuing someone
else.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|Oh, really? Who?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I don't know. But we can assume
they're no friend of Múspell.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|And you know what they say... The
enemy of my enemy is my friend.
All right, troops! We'll check this out.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Not yet... Not yet! I can't fall now...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That's... But he...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We need to save him before Múspell
finishes him off! There's no time to
waste!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|For coming to my rescue, I thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Those burns... Be still. You're too
wounded to move...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, my brother...$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hríd! It is you!$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Fjorm, Ylgr... It is good to see you
both safe.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh... It's so good to see you, too! I
didn't know whether you lived... But
why are you here in Múspell?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|After Nifl fell, I made my way to
Múspell in secret.$k$pLetting everyone think I had perished,
I aimed to assassinate Surtr... Even at
the cost of my life.$k$pYet I couldn't finish him off. All I got
for my trouble was these burns...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, Hríd...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|But we can't give up.$k$pSurtr can be killed. The Rite of
Flames, the source of his power...$k$pIts flames of rebirth allow Surtr to
be resurrected. We must extinguish
them.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Resurrected? That's exactly what
happened when we fought him...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|The Rite of Flames takes the form of
a blaze... Without fuel, the fire will
burn out. And he won't be revived.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|If we can cut off that power...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|We can kill him.$k$pA masked Emblian knight gave me
all of this information. If I remember
right, his name was...Zacharias.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Zacharias is here?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|He gave me this old map of Múspell.$k$pTo the south, near the border... They
sustain the rite with offerings.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|And so we have our destination. Any
information from Zacharias is
trustworthy.$k$pFinally... The key to defeating Surtr is
in our grasp!$k$p$Sbs150|
